title: Industrialist Anisuzzaman dies
body: Managing director of Canadian Showcase Ltd and Eastern Overseas Shipping Lines Mir Anisuzzaman died in Malaysia on Saturday. Former Rotary governor Mir Anis was undergoing treatment at the hospital there. His body will be buried in Dhaka, said a press release. In his career, Anis was involved in extensive social activities at the national and international levels through Rotary, in addition to business.
